Google Chrome Extension for FlexVone.

FlexVone works using WebRTC & SIP protocol. It makes communication easy and cost-effective.

 

Key features of FlexVone are:

-> Audio Calls

-> Video Calls

-> Conferencing

-> Call Hold

-> Call Transfer

-> Call Park

-> Mute/ Unmute

-> Call History

-> Phonebook

-> Extension Settings

-> Voicemail Play & Download

-> Fax Record
-> Chat
